ðŸ“– Summary: Uscrapper Vanta is an open-source Python tool designed for comprehensive web scraping, capable of extracting various data points from both the surface and deep web. It leverages multithreading and advanced anti-scraping defenses to gather information like email addresses, social media links, and geolocations, with new support for dark web (.onion) links and keyword-based scraping.
